measured_by: Inclusion of the Other in the Self Scale
justification: "Participants were asked … to complete the Inclusion of the Other in the Self scale (Aron, et al. 1992) with the T2 character."
construct: interpersonal closeness / inclusion of other in the self

justification: "Finally, participants were … asked to complete the 9-question Oxford Utilitarianism Scale battery (Kahane, et al. 2017)."
